youtube.title: How Carbon Laser Treatment Works for Pigmentation & Clear Skin
youtube.description: Discover the science behind Carbon Laser Treatment, also known as the Hollywood Peel! This video shows how the laser targets carbon particles to remove pigmentation, minimize pores, and rejuvenate the skin. Learn why this is a top-rated treatment for a clearer complexion.
